root.name: Battlefield 2: Armored Fury
root.description: Armored Fury is a booster pack that takes the Battlefield franchise to maps based on the United States Of AmericaVehiclesFantan Q-5A-10SU-39EC-635WZ-11Little Bird (OH-6AMuscle CarSemi TruckMapsMidnight SunOperation Road RageOperation HarvestSystem RequirementsMinimumWindows XP1,7GHz Intel Pentium 4 or equivalent512mb ram4Gb HDD8 speed dvd-rom128mb wuth 1,4 pixel shader supportDirect X9.0c128kbit/s Ethernet.
